DEFAULT.info: Creates a new account.
Virtual transaction to autorenew a crypto account.  Please note that there is no HAPI call for this transaction.
Updates an existing account.

service.rbh: (BASE_ACCOUNT_SIZE + memoSize + numKeys * KEY_SIZE + numLivehashes * LIVEHASH_SIZE) * expirationHours

DEFAULT.info: Initiates a transfer of hbars among two or more accounts.

TOKEN_FUNGIBLE_COMMON.info: Initiates a transfer of fungible token units and possibly hbar among two or more accounts.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER *(numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1

TOKEN_NON_FUNGIBLE_UNIQUE.info: Initiates a transfer of NFTs, possibly along with fungible token units and/or hbar, among two or more accounts.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize + (numNftTransfers * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE)

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize + (numNftTransfers * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE)

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize + (numNftTransfers * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE)) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1

TOKEN_FUNGIBLE_COMMON_WITH_CUSTOM_FEES.info: Initiates a transfer of token(s) among two or more accounts, triggering one or more custom fee payments.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + ((numAccountsOnTransfer + numCustomFeeHbarAdjustments) * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * ((numTokensInvolved + numCustomFeeTokensInvolved) * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * ((numTokenBalanceAdjustments + numCustomFeeTokenAdjustments) * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1

TOKEN_NON_FUNGIBLE_UNIQUE_WITH_CUSTOM_FE.info: Initiates a transfer of NFTs, possibly along with fungible token units and/or hbar, among two or more accounts, triggering one or more custom fee payments.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize + (numNftTransfers * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE)

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numAccountsOnTransfer * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokensInvolved * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * (numTokenBalanceAdjustments * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize + (numNftTransfers * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE)

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + ((numAccountsOnTransfer + numCustomFeeHbarAdjustments) * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * ((numTokensInvolved + numCustomFeeTokensInvolved) * TOKEN_ID_SIZE) + TOKEN_MULTIPLIER * ((numTokenBalanceAdjustments + numCustomFeeTokenAdjustments) * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE) + memoSize + (numNftTransfers * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE)) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1

DEFAULT.info: Deletes an account and transfers the balance to another account.
Adds a livehash to an account.

DEFAULT.info: Deletes a livehash from an account.
Retrieves a livehash from an account.
Retrieves all records created in the past 24 hours for an account.
Retrieves the hbar balance of an account.
Retrieves an account's information.

DEFAULT.info: Retrieves the list of proxy stakers for a node.
Creates a new topic for consensus service.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + memoSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + topicMemoSize + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + DURATION_SIZE + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + memoSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + topicMemoSize + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + DURATION_SIZE + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + memoSize) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1 + ((BASE_TOPIC_SIZE + topicMemoSize + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)) * expirationHours)

DEFAULT.info: Update a topic for consensus service.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + memoSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOPIC_ID_SIZE + topicMemoSize + (isExpirationTimeSet * TIMESTAMP_SIZE) + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (isAutoRenewPeriodSet * DURATION_SIZE) + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + memoSize) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1 + ((BASE_TOPIC_SIZE + topicMemoSize + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)) * expirationHours)

TOKEN_FUNGIBLE_COMMON_WITH_CUSTOM_FEES.info: Creates a fungible common token type with custom fee schedule.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_TOKEN_SIZE + (numFreezeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numSupplyKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numWipeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numKycKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + memoSize + tokenNameSize + tokenSymbolSize + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

TOKEN_NON_FUNGIBLE_UNIQUE_WITH_CUSTOM_FE.info: Creates a non-fungible unique token type with custom fee schedule.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_TOKEN_SIZE + (numFreezeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numSupplyKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numWipeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numKycKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + memoSize + tokenNameSize + tokenSymbolSize + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

service.rbh: ((BASE_TOKEN_SIZE + tokenNameSize + tokenSymbolSize + (numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numKycKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numWipeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numSupplyKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numFreezeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE) + (numFixedHbarCustomFees * FIXED_HBAR_FEE_SIZE) + (numFixedHtsCustomFees * FIXED_HTS_FEE_SIZE) + (numRoyaltyNoFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_NO_FALLBACK_SIZE) + (numRoyaltyHbarFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_HBAR_FALLBACK_SIZE) + (numRoyaltyHtsFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_HTS_FALLBACK_SIZE)) * expirationHours)

DEFAULT.info: Updates a token type's fee schedule to the given list of custom fees.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_TOKEN_SIZE + memoSize + newNumFixedHbarCustomFees * FIXED_HBAR_FEE_SIZE + newNumFixedHtsCustomFees * FIXED_HTS_FEE_SIZE + newNumFractionalCustomFees * FRACTIONAL_FEE_SIZE + newNumRoyaltyNoFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_NO_FALLBACK_SIZE + newNumFixedHbarCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_HBAR_FALLBACK_SIZE + newNumRoyaltyHtsFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_HTS_FALLBACK_SIZE

service.rbh: (increaseInNumFixedHbarCustomFees * FIXED_HBAR_FEE_SIZE + increaseInNumFixedHtsCustomFees * FIXED_HTS_FEE_SIZE + increaseInNumFractionalCustomFees * FRACTIONAL_FEE_SIZE + increaseInNumRoyaltyNoFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_NO_FALLBACK_SIZE + increaseInNumFixedHbarCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_HBAR_FALLBACK_SIZE + increaseInNumRoyaltyHtsFallbackCustomFees * ROYALTY_FEE_HTS_FALLBACK_SIZE) * expirationHours

TOKEN_FUNGIBLE_COMMON.info: Mints new tokens of a given token type.

TOKEN_NON_FUNGIBLE_UNIQUE.info: Mints new NFTs of a given unique token type.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + (numNftsMinted * numBytesMetadataPerNft)

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE  + memoSize + (numNftsMinted * numBytesMetadataPerNft)

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + numNftsMinted * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE + memoSize) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1 + (numNftsMinted * numBytesMetadataPerNft * expirationHours)

TOKEN_FUNGIBLE_COMMON.info: Burns existing units of a given fungible common token type.

TOKEN_NON_FUNGIBLE_UNIQUE.info: Burns existing NFTs of a given non-fungible unique token type.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + numSerialNosBurned * SERIAL_NO_SIZE

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + numSerialNosBurned * SERIAL_NO_SIZE

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + TOKEN_ID_SIZE * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + numSerialNosBurned * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1

DEFAULT.info: Associates one or more tokens with a particular account.
Disassociates one or more tokens from a particular account.
Grants KYC for a specified token type to a particular account.
Revokes KYC for a specified token type from a particular account.
Freezes transfers of the specified token for a particular account.
Unfreezes transfers of the specified token for a particular account.

TOKEN_FUNGIBLE_COMMON.info: Wipes the given number of fungible common token units from a particular account.

TOKEN_NON_FUNGIBLE_UNIQUE.info: Wipes the serial numbers of given NFTs for a given unique token type from a particular account.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + (numSerialNosWiped * SERIAL_NO_SIZE)

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + TOKEN_ID_SIZE + TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + (numSerialNosWiped * SERIAL_NO_SIZE)

service.rbh: (BASE_RECORD_SIZE + TOKEN_ID_SIZE * TRANSFER_LIST_SIZE + memoSize + numSerialNosWiped * NFT_TRANSFER_SIZE) * MINUTES_3 / HOURS_1

DEFAULT.info: Retrieves information about a given token type.

node.bpr: BASE_QUERYRESPONSE_SIZE + BASE_TOKEN_SIZE + (numFreezeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numSupplyKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numWipeKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numKycKeys * KEY_SIZE) + (numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE)  + tokenNameSize + tokenSymbolSize + (isAutoRenewAccountSet * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

DEFAULT.info: Retrieves information about a given NFT.
Creates and initializes a smart contract by referencing an existing bytecode file.
Updates (but does not run) an existing smart contract.
Deletes an existing contract.
Calls a method of the specified smart contract.
Retrieves a smart contract's information.
Calls a function of the stipulated smart contract to be run on a single node. The results of the function are returned. This does not impact state.
Retrieves the bytecode of a smart contract.
Converts between identifiers in the format used by Solidity to the format used by transactions.
Retrieves all records created in the past 24 hours for a smart contract.
Virtual transaction to autorenew a smart contract.  Please note that there is no HAPI call for this transaction.
Creates a file with the provided content.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_FILECREATE_SIZE + fileSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + memoSize

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_FILECREATE_SIZE + fileSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + memoSize

DEFAULT.info: Updates a file's information or contents.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + FILE_ID_SIZE + fileSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + memoSize

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + FILE_ID_SIZE + fileSize + (numSigsTotal * SIG_SIZE) + (numKeys * KEY_SIZE) + memoSize

DEFAULT.info: Deletes an existing file.
Appends the given content to the designated file.
Retrieves the contents of a file.
Retrieves a file's information.
Creates a scheduled transaction.

node.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_SCHEDULECREATE_SIZE + scheduledTransactionBytesSize + ((numSigsPayer + numScheduledSigs) * SIG_SIZE) + (numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE) + memoSize + (isScheduledPayerDifferent * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

network.bpt: BASE_TX_SIZE + BASE_SCHEDULECREATE_SIZE + scheduledTransactionBytesSize + ((numSigsPayer + numScheduledSigs) * SIG_SIZE) + (numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE) + memoSize + (isScheduledPayerDifferent * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)

service.rbh: (BASE_SCHEDULE_SIZE + memoSize + scheduledTransactionBytesSize + numAdminKeys * KEY_SIZE + numScheduledSigs * SIG_SIZE + (isScheduledPayerDifferent * ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE)) * expirationHours

DEFAULT.info: Adds a signature to a scheduled transaction.
Deletes a pending scheduled transaction.
Retrieves information for a pending scheduled transaction.

node.bpr: BASE_QUERYRESPONSE_SIZE + BASE_SCHEDULE_SIZE + (numAdminKeys + numVerifiedSigningKeys) * KEY_SIZE  + (isStateProofRequested * STATE_PROOF_SIZE) + scheduledTransactionBytesSize

DEFAULT.info: Retrieve the current version of the network.
Get entities by key.
Retrieve a single transaction receipt.
System delete an existing file.
